item.title: Cyclone Montha: IMD issues yellow alert for 11 districts in Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[The India Meteorological Department (IMD), Bengaluru, which has forecast fairly widespread rainfall over Karnataka for the next few days owing to Cyclone Montha, has issued a yellow alert for 11 districts till October 28.
C.S. Patil, a scientist at IMD Bengaluru, said that Uttara Kannada, Udupi, Dakshina Kannada, Bidar, Kalaburagi, Yadgir, Vijayapura, Bagalkot, Raichur, Koppal, and Gadag districts are likely to receive heavy rainfall till October 28..
ALSO READ: Cyclone Montha LIVE updates
. ...]]>
